blocks.name: qlax1i
blocks.content: One of the equations showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice. (This corresponds to axiom "ax-1" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: qlax2i
blocks.content: One of the equations showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice. (This corresponds to axiom "ax-2" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: qlaxr3i
blocks.content: A variation of the orthomodular law, showing ` CH ` is an orthomodular lattice. (This corresponds to axiom "ax-r3" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm qlaxr3i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, c1)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wceq(co(c2, chj, cfv(cort, c2)), co(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1))))
} = {
  eqtr4i(c0, c1, co(c0, chj, c1))
  omlsii(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
  chub1i(c0, c1)
  simpli(wceq(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), c0h), wceq(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1)), c0h))
  omlsii(c1, co(c0, chj, c1))
  chshii(co(c0, chj, c1))
  chub2i(c1, c0)
  simpri(wceq(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1)), c0h), wceq(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), c0h))
  mpbir(wa(wceq(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), c0h), wceq(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1)), c0h)), wceq(co(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), chj, cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1))), c0h))
  eqtr3i(co(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), chj, cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1))), c0h, cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  eqtr3i(cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), chj, cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1))), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))))
  incom(co(c0, chj, c1), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)))
  fh1i(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))
  cmcm2ii(co(c0, chj, c1), c0)
  cmcmii(co(c0, chj, c1), c0)
  cmj1i(c0, c1)
  cmcm2ii(co(c0, chj, c1), c1)
  cmcmii(co(c0, chj, c1), c1)
  cmj2i(c1, c0)
  mpbir(wceq(cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1)), c0h), wceq(cfv(cort, c0h), cfv(cort, cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1)))))
  3eqtr4i(cfv(cort, c0h), cfv(cort, cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1))), chba, co(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  eqtr3i(chba, co(cfv(cort, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1))), co(c2, chj, cfv(cort, c2)))
  chjoi(c2)
  choc0()
  chdmm1i(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1))
  chcon3i(cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1)), c0h)
  chincli(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, chj, c1))
  chjcli(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))
  h0elch()
  chj00i(cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1)))
  chincli(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c0))
  choccli(c0)
  chincli(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, c1))
  chjcli(c0, c1)
  choccli(c1)
}
